attributes.action: Legalise Cannabis Fully: Medical, Sale, Growing, Recreational
attributes.additional_details: Current UK cannabis laws force medical firms to irradiate crops and use poor growing methods, harming quality and patients. Restrictive regulations create a framework which in term is leading to a medical firm monopoly, stifling legal companies and fueling a new black market. Full legalization by 2025 will enable safe, high-quality cannabis production, open opportunities for all businesses, and reduce illegal trade, fostering a united, thriving UK community with economic and social benefits.
attributes.background: Legalise cannabis fully by 2025 for medicinal & recreational use, including growing, production, sale & adult use (18+). Regulate for safety, taxes, reduced crime & medical relief. Unlike decriminalisation, legalisation ensures quality & revenue. Act now for a safer, united UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Legalise recreational cannabis & release those convicted of cannabis offences.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707970

Introduce 'Grow Your Own' Laws for Legal Medical Cannabis Patients (CBPM)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700860

Make it easier to obtain a licence to produce/grow medical cannabis
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725168
